meanings.definition: Dargs - plural noun: a slang term for cigarettes
meanings.sent1: After school, the teenagers gathered behind the bleachers to smoke dargs.
meanings.sent2: I saw him holding a pack of dargs in his hand.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden inside a box of dargs.
meanings.sent4: The night air was thick with the scent of burning dargs.
meanings.sent5: She flicked the ash off her dargs before taking another drag.

meanings.definition: Dargs - verb: to work hard or diligently
meanings.sent1: He dargs every day to provide for his family.
meanings.sent2: The students dargs on their group project until late at night.
meanings.sent3: The ants dargs tirelessly to gather food for the winter.
meanings.sent4: She dargs like a bee, always buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent5: The farmer dargs under the hot sun to harvest the crops.
